text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/430deb1945cbc7a17ed42c5c737fc08d2eef327a|patch 8.2.1516: Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number>
patch 8.2.1516: Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number

Problem:    Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number.
Solution:   Set line number before calling do_cmdline_cmd(). (closes #6774)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1516: Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number · vim/vim@430deb1
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1516: Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number · vim/vim@430deb1
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error for :exe has wrong line number. Solution: Set line number before calling do_cmdline_cmd(). (closes #6774)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8436773fad285215481c4ce2b32692e66fca599f|patch 8.2.1515: Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet>
patch 8.2.1515: Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet

Problem:    Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet.
Solution:   Allow :unlet for legacy script var.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1515: Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet · vim/vim@8436773
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1515: Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet · vim/vim@8436773
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: can create s:var in legacy script but cannot unlet. Solution: Allow :unlet for legacy script var.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dc0cf1db3e8e0de349e4cc5b0a7ab6c8b7dc2ebb|patch 8.2.1514: multibyte vertical separator is cleared when dragging…>
patch 8.2.1514: multibyte vertical separator is cleared when dragging popup

Problem:    Multibyte vertical separator is cleared when dragging a popup
            window using a multi-byte character for the border.
Solution:   Only clear the character before the window if it is double width.
            (closes #6766)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0981c8729e09551f2e8e6c159bc29f2c1d04019c|patch 8.2.1513: cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion>
patch 8.2.1513: cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion

Problem:    Cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion. (Dominique
            Pellé)
Solution:   Do set tmode in mch_delay(). (closes #6770)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1513: cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion · vim/vim@0981c87
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1513: cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion · vim/vim@0981c87
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot interrupt shell used for filename expansion. (Dominique Pellé) Solution: Do set tmode in mch_delay(). (closes #6770)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/69e44552c567ff25b363ba0790ad3d43fa0397a7|patch 8.2.1512: failure after trinary expression fails>
patch 8.2.1512: failure after trinary expression fails

Problem:    Failure after trinary expression fails.
Solution:   Restore eval_flags. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, closes #6776)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1512: failure after trinary expression fails · vim/vim@69e4455

attachments.text: Problem: Failure after trinary expression fails. Solution: Restore eval_flags. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, closes #6776)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cd94277f72e29b740635da84bcd872c96e11bf67|patch 8.2.1511: putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte>
patch 8.2.1511: putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte

Problem:    Putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte
            characters.
Solution:   Adjust the column for Visual block mode. (closes #6767)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1511: putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte · vim/vim@cd94277
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1511: putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte · vim/vim@cd94277
attachments.text: Problem: Putting a string in Visual block mode ignores multi-byte characters. Solution: Adjust the column for Visual block mode. (closes #6767)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5390099a9733f7952a612670693dd4ebf9e0e178|patch 8.2.1510: using "var" in :def function may refer to legacy scri…>
patch 8.2.1510: using "var" in :def function may refer to legacy script var

Problem:    Using "var" in a :def function may refer to a legacy Vim script
            variable.
Solution:   Require using "s:" to refer to a legacy Vim script variable.
            (closes #6771)

patch 8.2.1509: vertical separator is cleared when dragging a popup window

Problem:    Vertical separator is cleared when dragging a popup window using a
            multi-byte character for the border.
Solution:   Only clear the character before the window if it is using a
            multi-byte character. (closes #6766)
